PageWidgetPortable.Title: Ordens de viagem
PageWidgetPortable.XmlAttributes: <SimpleGridAttributes> <EntityViewName>AGA_OV_TIPOS.GRID</EntityViewName> <CanDelete>false</CanDelete> <CanUpdate>false</CanUpdate> <CanInsert>false</CanInsert> <Mode>1</Mode> <UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible>false</UserDefinedSelectColumnVisible> <UserDefinedPageSize>10</UserDefinedPageSize> <SystemFilterOnly>false</SystemFilterOnly> <DisplayRowCommand>true</DisplayRowCommand> <CompanyFilterMode>2</CompanyFilterMode> <UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause>HANDLE IN (SELECT TIPO FROM OV_ORDENSVIAGEM WHERE (AREA IN (SELECT AREA FROM OV_AREASUSUARIOS WHERE USUARIO = @USUARIO)) OR ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OV_AREASUSUARIOS WHERE USUARIO = @USUARIO) = 0))</UserDefinedCriteriaWhereClause> <FormUrl>~/aga/a/f/aga_t1866_at2045_hs177502a4.aspx</FormUrl> <UserDefinedDisableRowSelection>false</UserDefinedDisableRowSelection> </SimpleGridAttributes>
